channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
ok i can get everything else setup, but idk how to forward my port. my friends told me to go to a certain site, but idk my router.
my comp is a Microsoft Compaq Presario its # is SR1617CL
could somebody tell me where to go and how to forward my port? i want to get my new server TemplarScape running and idk how to link it up with hamachi either :( could somebody tell me: A) how to link it to hamachi to bypass port forwarding or B) where to go to forward my port
my server is TemplarScape.servegame.com or 70.226.91.117

i got hamachi but idk how to link my server to it to bypass port forwarding
